top.title: Hillary Clinton accuses Trump administration of Epstein files 'cover-up' in BBC interview
top.summary: "Get the files out. They are slow-walking it," the former US secretary of state says. The White House says it has done "more for the victims than Democrats ever did".

top.title: Trump says he will be 'indirectly' involved in Iran nuclear talks
top.summary: Speaking ahead of negotiations on Tuesday, the US president says he believes Iran wants to make a deal.

top.title: US build-up of warships and fighter jets tracked near Iran
top.summary: BBC Verify has seen US aircraft carrier USS Abraham Lincoln near Iran ahead of talks between the two countries

top.title: How dark web agent spotted bedroom wall clue to rescue girl from years of harm
top.summary: Detectives desperate to locate a 12-year-old, seen abused online, found a surprising lead.

top.title: The tech bros might show more humility in Delhi – but will they make AI any safer?
top.summary: As global tech leaders meet Delhi, India hopes to level the playing field for countries outside the US and China.

top.title: We will do battle with AI chatbots as we did with Grok, says Starmer
top.summary: The government's new plans will mean no online platform will get a "free pass" on children's safety on the internet, the prime minister says.
